CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is populated automatically, but can be altered by user selection within the spreading application. This field indicates whether a spread statement period is a fiscal year. When true, the spread statement period is a fiscal year. When false, the spread statement period is not a fiscal year. By default, this is enabled when the number of months is 12 and the statement date month matches the month set in "Fiscal_Year_End" field onthe Account object.
CustomField.label: Is Fiscal Year
